attributes.action: Stop the draconian anti-hot beverage faclitiles rule imposed on sixth years across the nation.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is a well known fact that beverages such as tea and coffee stimulate our minds and facilitate problem solving and improve concentration. It is inconceivable that sixth years, reaching the age of 18, are not allowed fully tested kettles in their common rooms. This debacle must be halted at all costs.
